script:
They are broadcasting a program on TV. I will keep you updated on what happens, and at the end, I will ask you a question about what happened on the show. Okay?
(On TV) Elizabeth entered the den.
(On TV) Mia entered the den.
(On TV) The socks are in the pantry.
(On TV) Elizabeth exited the den.
(On TV) Mia loves the pear
(On TV) Mia moved the socks to the basket.
The TV program has ended for today. Where would Elizabeth look for the socks?
Provide your answer in JSON form with a single word as answer, like this: {"answer": "word"}
